name: mongo-curry
description: A simple, curried approach to MongoDB for Node
author: Ben Doty <creplav@gmail.com>

scripts.start: yarn eslint && yarn build && node dist/app.js
scripts.test: yarn build && nyc riteway -r @babel/polyfill dist/**/**/*.test.js dist/**/*.test.js | tap-nirvana
scripts.itest: yarn build && nyc riteway  -r @babel/polyfill dist/**/**/*.int-test.js dist/**/*.int-test.js | tap-nirvana
